title: THE FUGITIVE 118 Where the Action Is [retr?tv]
description:
THE FUGITIVE -1x18- Where the Action Is    (1/28/1964)   

While working as a hotel lifeguard in Reno, Nevada, Kimble is caught in the middle of a feud between the hotel owner Dan Polichek, and his spoiled and rambunctious teenage daughter Christine. &#039;Chris&#039; believes her father drove away her mother who committed suicide years ago and she sets out to disgrace Mr. Polichek by provoking bar fights, humiliating herself, and goes too far when she pretends to be engaging herself in an affair with the reluctant Kimble.

Starring David Janssen as Doctor Richard Kimble
Guest star: Telly Savalas (Polichek), Joanna Frank (Chris), Don Keefer (Ben), Maxine Stuart (Mrs. Gaines), Connie Gilchrist (Proprietor), Mark Slade (Chris&#039; Male Friend (uncredited)), Beverly Powers (Stripper)
